casebody.data:
April 4, 1994

No.---.

Byrd v. Ohio; Greer v. Ohio; Henderson v. Ohio; Hicks v. Ohio; Jamison v. Ohio; Montgomery v. Ohio; Poindexter v. Ohio; Scott v. Ohio; and Sowell v. Ohio.

Motion for leave to proceed in forma pawperis without an affidavit of indigency executed by Jay D. Scott granted.
